article_title: Michael Taube: Unexpected Twists in the Rob Ford Saga
article_text:
Toronto

Until Wednesday, Rob Ford, Toronto's infamous crack-smoking mayor, appeared to be mounting a remarkable political comeback. A public-opinion poll two weeks ago showed him nearly tied for the lead in his unlikely bid for re-election next month. But then came the Sept. 10 news that Mr. Ford had been hospitalized with a tumor near his...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Michael Taube writes that Toronto's mayor was mounting an improbable comeback, but now cancer worries have intervened.
twitter.title: Unexpected Twists in the Rob Ford Saga
